elements.expression: filters | esdocs index="matches" | markdown font={font family="'Book Antiqua', Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=60 align="center" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "First stage, Russia vs Saudi Arabia" | render
esdocs index="team-stats*" query="match_name:First stage, Russia vs Saudi Arabia AND country:Russia" fields="goals" | getCell | repeatImage size=50 | render

esdocs index="team-stats*" query="match_name:\"First stage, Russia vs Saudi Arabia\"" | pointseries color="country" size="ball_possession" | pie palette={palette "#C5FAF4" "#0F6259" gradient=true} legend=false font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=10 align="left" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} | render

filters | demodata | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=14 align="left" color="#a6dfa2" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "# Ball Possession:" | render

timefilter column="time" from="2018-01-01 02:00:00.000" to="2018-01-01 03:50:00.000" | timelion query=".es(index='events*',timefield='time',q='\"First stage, Russia vs Saudi Arabia\" AND type_of_event:goal*')" | pointseries x="@timestamp" y="value" | plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle points="1" bars="5" lines="0" color="#a6dfa2"} legend=false xaxis=true yaxis=false | render containerStyle={containerStyle border=" solid rgba(255,255,255,0)" backgroundColor="rgba(255,255,255,0)" opacity="1" padding="1px" borderRadius=".1px"}

filters | demodata | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=14 align="left" color="#a6dfa2" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "# Goals over time:" | render

filters | esdocs index="matches" | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=24 align="left" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "# goals over time
### Aggregates all goals from all of the matches
* \\- Look how many goals occur at the end of the game!
* \\- Before the half-time break (45`) there aren't many goals however just after it the players get a boost!" | render

timefilter column="time" from="2018-01-01 02:00:00.000" to="2018-01-01 03:50:00.000" | timelion query=".es(index=events*, timefield=time, q=type_of_event:goal*)" | pointseries x="@timestamp" y="value" color="@timestamp" | plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle points="1" bars="5" lines="0" color="#a6dfa2"} legend=false xaxis=true yaxis=true | render containerStyle={containerStyle border=" solid rgba(255,255,255,0)" backgroundColor="rgba(255,255,255,0)" opacity="1" padding="1px" borderRadius=".1px"}

filters | esdocs index="matches" | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=24 align="left" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "# substitutions over time
### Aggregates all substitutions from all of the matches
* \\- At the half-time break (45`) the coaches preform a lot of substitutions
* \\- The substitutions at the second half approximately normally distributed" | render

timefilter column="time" from="2018-01-01 02:00:00.000" to="2018-01-01 03:50:00.000" | timelion query=".es(index=events*, timefield=time, q=type_of_event:substitution-in)" | pointseries x="@timestamp" y="value" color="@timestamp" | plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle points="1" bars="5" lines="0" color="#a6dfa2"} legend=false xaxis=true yaxis=true | render containerStyle={containerStyle border=" solid rgba(255,255,255,0)" backgroundColor="rgba(255,255,255,0)" opacity="1" padding="1px" borderRadius=".1px"}

filters | esdocs index="matches" | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=24 align="left" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "# Tactics
## Average number of goals by tactic:" | render
esdocs index="team-stats" | pointseries x="tactics" y="sum(goals)/count(tactics)" color="tactics" | plot defaultStyle={seriesStyle points=5 bars="1"} | render

esdocs index="team-stats" | pointseries color="tactics" size="count(tactics)" | pie legend=true font={font family="'Open Sans', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif" size=0 align="left" color="#000000" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} palette={palette "#882E72" "#B178A6" "#D6C1DE" "#1965B0" "#5289C7" "#7BAFDE" "#4EB265" "#90C987" "#CAE0AB" "#F7EE55" "#F6C141" "#F1932D" "#E8601C" "#DC050C" gradient=false} | render

filters | esdocs index="matches" | markdown font={font family="Didot, Georgia, Garamond, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif" size=24 align="left" color="#FFFFFF" weight="normal" underline=false italic=false} "## Tactic's distribution:
seems like the graph above is a little biased, since the best tactic was played only once so far.." | render
